data.chText: （收割后干燥的）禾秆，麦秆，稻草
data.enText: stems of wheat or other grain plants that have been cut and dried. Straw is used for making mats , hats, etc., for packing things to protect them, and as food for animals or for them to sleep on.
a mattress filled with straw
a straw hat
a single stem or piece of straw

data.chText: 他嘴里嚼着一根麦秆，靠到栅门上。
data.enText: He was leaning over the gate chewing on a straw.
drinking straw
a thin tube of plastic or paper that you suck a drink through
clutch/grasp at straws

data.chText: （在危难中）抓救命稻草，不放过任何微小的机会
data.enText: to try all possible means to find a solution or some hope in a difficult or unpleasant situation, even though this seems very unlikely
the last/final straw
the straw that breaks the camel's back

data.chText: 压垮骆驼的最后一根稻草；终于使人不堪忍受的最后一件事（或因素等）
data.enText: the last in a series of bad events, etc. that makes it impossible for you to accept a situation any longer
a straw in the wind

data.chText: （预示发生某事的）迹象，苗头，征兆
data.enText: a small sign of what might happen in the future
make bricks without straw
to try to work without the necessary material, money, information, etc.
draw the short straw
get the short end of the stick

data.chText: 抽到倒霉签；被派做苦差事
data.enText: to be the person in a group who is chosen or forced to perform an unpleasant duty or task

data.chText: 我抽到了下下签，只得打扫厕所了。
data.enText: I drew the short straw and had to clean the toilets.
clutch/grasp at straws

data.chText: （在危难中）抓救命稻草，不放过任何微小的机会
data.enText: to try all possible means to find a solution or some hope in a difficult or unpleasant situation, even though this seems very unlikely
the last/final straw
the straw that breaks the camel's back

data.chText: 压垮骆驼的最后一根稻草；终于使人不堪忍受的最后一件事（或因素等）
data.enText: the last in a series of bad events, etc. that makes it impossible for you to accept a situation any longer
a straw in the wind

data.chText: （预示发生某事的）迹象，苗头，征兆
data.enText: a small sign of what might happen in the future
make bricks without straw
to try to work without the necessary material, money, information, etc.
draw the short straw
get the short end of the stick

data.chText: 抽到倒霉签；被派做苦差事
data.enText: to be the person in a group who is chosen or forced to perform an unpleasant duty or task

data.chText: 我抽到了下下签，只得打扫厕所了。
data.enText: I drew the short straw and had to clean the toilets.

tr: a thin paper or plastic tube used to suck liquids into the mouth
dull yellow, often diluted with white
material consisting of seed coverings and small pieces of stem or leaves that have been separated from the seeds
plant fiber used e.g. for making baskets and hats or as fodder

example: strew toys all over the carpet

tr: cover or provide with or as if with straw
example: cows were strawed to weather the snowstorm

tr: of a pale yellow color like straw

value.def: Straw consists of the dried, yellowish stalks from crops such as wheat or barley.

example.ex: The barn was full of bales of straw...
example.tran: 谷仓里堆满了成捆的稻草。

example.ex: I stumbled through mud to a yard strewn with straw.
example.tran: 我跌跌撞撞地趟过泥地来到一个堆满麦秆的场院。

value.def: A straw is a thin tube of paper or plastic, which you use to suck a drink into your mouth.

example.ex: ...a bottle of lemonade with a straw in it.
example.tran: 一瓶插着吸管的柠檬水

value.def: If you are clutching at straws or grasping at straws, you are trying unusual or extreme ideas or methods because other ideas or methods have failed.

example.ex: ...a badly thought-out scheme from a Government clutching at straws.
example.tran: 政府情急之下采取的考虑欠周的计划

value.tran: 抓救命稻草;采取极端措施;作绝望的挣扎

value.def: If an event is the last straw or the straw that broke the camel's back, it is the latest in a series of unpleasant or undesirable events, and makes you feel that you cannot tolerate a situation any longer.

example.ex: For him the Church's decision to allow the ordination of women had been the last straw...
example.tran: 教会同意授给女性神职的决定使他终于忍无可忍。

example.ex: Then came the recession. Revenues dropped, but the straw to break the camel's back was the war.
example.tran: 之后出现了经济衰退，财政收入下降，但致命的打击还是那场战争。

value.tran: 压垮骆驼的最后一根稻草;最终使人不堪忍受的事

value.def: If you draw the short straw, you are chosen from a number of people to perform a job or duty that you will not enjoy.

example.ex: ...if a few of your guests have drawn the short straw and agreed to drive others home after your summer barbecue.
example.tran: 如果你的一些客人不幸被抓了壮丁，同意在夏日烧烤野餐结束后开车把其他人送回家

value.def: If you say that an incident or piece of news is a straw in the wind, you mean that it gives an indication of what might happen in the future.

example.ex: The latest straw in the wind is a pick-up in sales among the nation's retail giants.
example.tran: 最新的迹象是该国几家零售巨头的销售额有所上升。

trans: 稻草；稻秆；水稻秸秆；稻秸秆；稻秸
凉帽；帽子；草帽；草帽歌；草帽之歌
黄纸板；稻草制成的纸面草板；草纸板；麦秸板
做无草之砖；做无米之炊；制无草之砖；作无米之炊
最後一根稻草；压断骆驼脊背的稻草；最后一根稻草；导致失败的最后一击；导致失败之最后一击
昆明犬草黄品系；草黄品系；稻草黄；草黄；稻草黃
